comment: Let me be perfectly clear. Republicans don't want any harm to come to President Obama or Hillary Clinton. We want them to go to jail for a very long time.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / let-01

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / clear-06
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1-of (p / perfect-02)))
      :snt2 (w / want-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p3 / political-party
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Republican"))))
            :ARG1 (h2 / harm-01
                  :ARG1 (o / or

                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Obama")
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (p5 / president)))
                        :op2 (p6 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Hillary"
                                    :op2 "Clinton")
                              :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 p5)))
                  :mod (a / any)))
      :snt3 (w2 / want-01
            :ARG0 (w3 / we)
            :ARG1 (ii2 / imprison-01
                  :ARG1 (t / they)
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / long-03
                        :degree (v / very)))))
